extendedInfo.description: New mothers and fathers try to determine familiar features in their babies and understand whom they resemble. But it is not so easy because parents need to see themselves and their baby together.   Diaâs Likeness is excited to help you! The application will offer you to take a photo of different parts of the body or choose it from your library. Then it will place all three photos (baby, mother and father) together on a screen so that you can easy compare them.   After passing all steps, Diaâs Likeness will conclude whom your baby resembles taking into account your answers. Then you will be able to share the results with your relatives and friends through Twitter, Facebook, Google+, e-mail and sms.   All taken photos are stored in the application and photo library of your smartphone. You always be able to show photos of each part of the body of the baby, mother and father together so that everybody can compare them and give you an opinion.   Have fun!TAGS: new, baby, fun, like, mother, father

reviews.title: Igor
reviews.comment: I love this app!  We tried it with my wife and it was a lot of fun. The app has very user friendly interface and is simple in use. It allows to compare different features (eyes, ears, mouth, ...) of a baby with parents. Before this app we could not do this cause in the moment we could see only two of us :-)  It was surprisingly how different can be baby\'s features:  1) my daughter\'s earss are the same as mine but we have never compared them earlier; 2) the same thing is with fingers: daughter\'s middle finger is longer that forefinger! My ones are the same but my wife has quite the opposite forefinger longer.  Thanks for the app!
reviews.author: A Google User
